remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示可用的预定义的画笔颜色样本的表，请参阅。For a table of swatches that show the available pre-defined brush colors, see . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的属性 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of an element (). MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness BorderThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.BorderThickness : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的边框粗细。

span.span: Gets or sets the border thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，指定要应用的边框量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of border to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为统一粗细，即零 (**0.0**)。

span.span: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 单个的字符串表示形式要统一应用于所有四个宽度尺寸值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`等效于值为`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 以设备无关的像素为单位的非限定的值。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包括小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序的字符串表示形式对应于左侧、 顶部、 用于独立粗细维度值对，和 bottom，按此顺序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 必须用逗号; 分隔的四个值不允许有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5,10,15,20"会导致 5 个像素的边框左侧的内容、 10 个像素的内容的顶部边框、 15 像素的内容，右侧的边框和 20 像素的以下内容的边框。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of border to the left of content, 10 pixels of border above content, 15 pixels of border to the right of content, and 20 pixels of border below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 一个值，该值描述*uniformThickness*跟以下单位说明符之一： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1in"`提供统一的边框的所有方向 1 英寸。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform border of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 一个值，该值描述*independentThickness*，与每个独立值后跟以下单位说明符之一： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如 `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可能会混合或从一个或多个值中省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的属性元素 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_BordersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_bordersxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照： 蓝色，1/块的 4 英寸边框](~/add/media/block-borders.png "屏幕快照： Block 周围的蓝色，1/4 英寸边框")![Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block](~/add/media/block-borders.png "Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_borders)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_borders)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LineHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.LineHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置各行内容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 一个双精度值，指定行的高度（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A double value specifying the height of line in device independent pixels.

value.span: 必须等于或大于0.0034且等于或小于160000。

span.span: must be equal to or greater than 0.0034 and equal to or less then 160000.

value.span: 值为(等效于特性值"自动") 会导致行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此值不会更改关联的文本; 的高度相反，它将更改包含文本行的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 除了此属性中的行的布局受其属性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字符串表示形式值等于或大于`0.0034`但比等于或小于`160000`。String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`. 以设备无关的像素为单位的非限定的值。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包括小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 一个*双*值，上文所述 (只不过`Auto`) 后跟以下单位说明符之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm==(96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt==(96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自动Auto 行高度由当前字体特征自动确定的原因。Causes the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 等效于属性值的。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性的元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_lineheightxaml)] 下图显示了上一示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the previous example renders. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "屏幕快照： FlowDocument LineHeight")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight") 下图显示的 = 。The following figure shows how the same example renders with the default setting of =. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocument lineheight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "屏幕快照： FlowDocument LineHeight 默认值")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_lineheight)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_lineheight)]

span.span: Raised if an attempt is made to set to a non-positive value.

summary.span: 获取或设置一种机制，根据该机制来为文本元素内的每一行文字确定一个行框。

span.span: Gets or sets the mechanism by which a line box is determined for each line of text within the text element.

span.span: The mechanism by which a line box is determined for each line of text within the text element.
The default value is .

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的边距粗细。

span.span: Gets or sets the margin thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，它以与设备无关的像素为单位指定要应用的边距量。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of margin to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为统一粗细，即零 (**0.0**)。

span.span: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是超出了元素的内容区域，该元素的内容区域的边缘和父元素的边缘之间的缓冲区空间。 is buffer space that falls outside of an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. 与之相反，这是属于内部元素的内容区域，该元素的内容和元素的内部边缘之间的缓冲区空间。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls inside of an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 单个的字符串表示形式要统一应用于所有四个宽度尺寸值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`等效于值为`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 以设备无关的像素为单位的非限定的值。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包括小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序的字符串表示形式对应于左侧、 顶部、 用于独立粗细维度值对，和 bottom，按此顺序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 必须用逗号; 分隔的四个值不允许有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5,10,15,20"会导致 5 个像素，距的左侧的内容、 10 个像素的内容的上边距、 15 像素的内容，右边距和 20 个像素的以下内容的边距。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of margin to the left of content, 10 pixels of margin above content, 15 pixels of margin to the right of content, and 20 pixels of margin below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 一个值，该值描述*uniformThickness*跟以下单位说明符之一： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1in"`提供统一的所有方向 1 英寸边距。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform margin of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 一个值，该值描述*independentThickness*，与每个独立值后跟以下单位说明符之一： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如 `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可能会混合或从一个或多个值中省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的属性元素 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPaddingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_marginpaddingxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. 为了进行说明使用夸张的宽度和颜色。Exaggerated thicknesses and colors are used for illustration. ![屏幕快照： 具有填充和边距如段落](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "屏幕快照： 具有填充和边距的段落")![Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_marginpadding)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_marginpadding)]

span.span: Gets or sets the padding thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，它指定要应用的边距量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为统一粗细，即零 (**0.0**)。

span.span: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是范围内元素的内容区域，该元素的内容和元素的内部边缘之间的缓冲区空间。 is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. 与之相反，超出了元素的内容区域，该元素的内容区域的边缘和父元素的边缘之间的缓冲空间。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls outside of an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 单个的字符串表示形式要统一应用于所有四个宽度尺寸值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`等效于值为`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 以设备无关的像素为单位的非限定的值。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包括小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序的字符串表示形式对应于左侧、 顶部、 用于独立粗细维度值对，和 bottom，按此顺序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 必须用逗号; 分隔的四个值不允许有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5,10,15,20"会导致 5 个像素的填充内容、 内容上方的填充的 10 个像素、 15 像素的内容，右侧的填充和 20 个像素的以下内容填充的左侧。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 一个值，该值描述*uniformThickness*跟以下单位说明符之一： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1in"`提供的所有方向 1 英寸边距统一。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 一个值，该值描述*independentThickness*，与每个独立值后跟以下单位说明符之一： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如 `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可能会混合或从一个或多个值中省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的属性元素 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPaddingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_marginpaddingxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. 为了进行说明使用夸张的宽度和颜色。Exaggerated thicknesses and colors are used for illustration. ![屏幕快照： 具有填充和边距如段落](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "屏幕快照： 具有填充和边距的段落")![Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_marginpadding)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_marginpadding)]

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether or not the effective value of the property should be serialized during serialization of an object deriving from .

returns.span: 如果 属性应被序列化，则为 ；否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::TextAlignment TextAlignment { System::Windows::TextAlignment get(); void set(System::Windows::TextAlignment value); };
member this.TextAlignment : System.Windows.TextAlignment with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the horizontal alignment of text content.

value.span: 枚举的一个成员，它指定所需的对齐方式。

span.span: A member of the enumerations specifying the desired alignment.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性的元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignmentXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_textalignmentxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例使用的呈现效果**左侧**文本对齐方式 （默认值）。The following figure shows how the previous example renders with **Left** text alignment (the default). ![屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值为左对齐](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值为左对齐")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left") 下图显示了同一个示例使用的呈现效果**右**文本对齐方式。The following figure shows how the same example renders with **Right** text alignment. ![屏幕快照： TextAlign 值 Right](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "屏幕快照： TextAlign 值 Right")![Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right") 下图显示了同一个示例使用的呈现效果**Center**文本对齐方式。The following figure shows how the same example renders with **Center** text alignment. ![屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值 Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值 Center")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignment](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_textalignment)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignment](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_textalignment)]
